SEARCH
Module com.javarepowizards.portfoliomanager
Package com.javarepowizards.portfoliomanager.domain.stock

Class Stock

java.lang.Object
com.javarepowizards.portfoliomanager.domain.stock.Stock
All Implemented Interfaces:
IStock
public class Stock extends Object implements IStock
Concrete implementation of IStock representing a stock with its price history and optional descriptions. Instances are immutable after construction.

  • Constructor Details

    • Stock

      public Stock(String ticker, String companyName, List<PriceRecord> allRecords)
      Constructs a Stock using only price records. This constructor is provided for backward compatibility. Short and long descriptions default to empty strings.
      Parameters:
      ticker - the stock ticker symbol, not null or empty
      companyName - the full name of the company, not null
      allRecords - a list of PriceRecord objects sorted by date, with the latest record as its last element
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if allRecords is empty

    • Stock

      public Stock(String ticker, String companyName, List<PriceRecord> allRecords, String shortDescription, String longDescription)
      Constructs a Stock with price records and textual descriptions.
      Parameters:
      ticker - the stock ticker symbol, not null or empty
      companyName - the full name of the company, not null
      allRecords - a list of PriceRecord objects sorted by date, with the latest record as its last element
      shortDescription - a brief description of the stock, not null
      longDescription - a detailed description of the stock, not null
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if allRecords is empty
